text: :wave: Hi everyone! i am debby  and i am new here

Cards can go in any tab you wish them to! In fact, admins can organize and move around cards and also manage team based views of them.

However, for cards to appear on sidebar vs tab, today, you have to add `location` parameter to it. You can find more in Card configuration docs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-custom-crm-cards-with-projects#card-configuration|here>.

<@U25PYL3Q8> you can use <#C04A3FUK8HK|crm-development-beta> slack channel or <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/gh-p/crm-development-tools-beta|community group> for beta related questions.
I want to be clear, I don’t see how they go into overview or activities
Both Carter and I believe that you can’t make that happen
But I managed to find it
So, click customize tab, then goto edit default view, then you have to “add card” then select the new card, it will be placed into the tab and you are able to reorder it then maybe save

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> I don’t believe this says anything in the documentation about this, can you point to where it is? I tend to read fast and miss things, but for everyone on my team tell me it isn’t possible after looking at docs then <@U01QVR44MEY> as well — seems like it isn’t in the documentation or it doesn’t have it’s own section, or it is in the smallest print possible.
Oh yea, this is another documentation update we need to add. Thanks for sharing. I was going to make a video on how to do this, but it seems you figured it out?
Yes, Nick solved it but it's just a little hard to know that this is possible if HubSpot never says it's possible in the docs
Roger that. One docs update is coming up soon :)
why i can't create child themes in design tools?
do you use free CMS? *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/child-themes#:~:text=The%20total%20number%20of%20child,Hub%20Enterprise%3A%2010%20child%20themes|Check this>*
